name: AS_7_3_Support_Financial_Reporting
title: AS.7.3 Support Financial Reporting (Function)
description: Provide clinical data to support administrative and financial reporting.
purpose: The system may be able to generate or support the creation of a bill based on health record data. Maximizing the extent to which administrative and financial data can be derived or developed from clinical data by the system, will lessen provider reporting burdens and the time it takes to complete administrative and financial processes such as claim reimbursement. This may be implemented by mapping of clinical terminologies in use to administrative and financial terminologies. Administrative and financial systems may be integrated or non-integrated.

statement.label: AS.7.3#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture and maintain clinical data for administrative and financial requirements.

statement.label: AS.7.3#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD export appropriate data in required format to administrative and financial systems according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
